content.detailedDescription:
I have been observing ufo and ufo activity every since one landed in my backyard on july of 1972 just before i started 12th grade in high school.
last night was simular to that in some aspects except they did not land as far as know. the first time i ever saw a ufo it landed in the field behind our house. we lived in a lonely location so much so that if a car was comming our way we knew they were comming to see us or they were lost. my father who goes to bed early just about night had gotten up for some reason, bathroom break or something. he spotted the ufo out the window of his beadroom. he screamed for us to get out of bed, that we had to leave imediatelly with out bothering to get dressed or anything he ran out the door and started the car. my father was not a loud person, he was mostly in his home life soft spoken and did not get upset all that much. but that night he was screamming at the top of his lungs shocking all of us in the house. as we left the yard and headed up the hill i looked toward the back of the house and in the field behind the house a large football shaped object sat. it was bright and glowing in a orange color. a person could see trees lighted behind it and bushes and the ground in front of the object was lighted up. at the time i saw it, it was not moving. my father drove us and the car into the nearest town shouting at the top of his lungs there was a uf0 in the backyard and he wanted to leave before they abducted us. my father was a minister and well educated, eaning his master degree in greek and hebrew a few months before. my dog, a german shepherd would not come out from under of the house for three days it took us forever it seemed like to calm our horse penny, and she was not an excitable horse. when we finally returned home the ufo had left. 
last night i went outside to take my dog for a walk, i looked up scanning the horizon which i do escpecially on a clear cloudless night. it was then i screamed. as i was looking up i observed 10 ufos hanging in the sky over my head. they were, all except one, in a diamond pattern. for ease of discription i will describe it like a baseball diamond giving the positions in those terms if thats alright. the two largest objectss were at second base and home plate. there were 7 smaller but they were like the larger objects white in color. these craft spread out from third base past the pitchers mound all the way over to first base. the diamond shaped formation as far as i know was stationary. they were with the larger crafts in a north south position with smaller craft from left to right. the local ufo that i have mentioned in previous reports in the last few days was positioned in the east next to the moon. the others were west of the moon and east of the horizion. i have lived in this area since 1991 and have never before have seen anyting like what i saw last night and i have observed many differnet craft but had never seen anything like that. the two larger objects appeared to be firing white beams of lights at each other, and one was hit they became brighter in color. the smaller craft ranged accross the middle seemed too reflect the light toward the other craft. i am not sure what the purpose for the smaller craft were to tell you the truth. i went into the house trying to get my husband to go and look but he had already seen it. i have never been so scared in my life. i dont know why they were fighting (theyve been fighting all week on and off) but i had never seen anyting this aggressive out of either of the objects. i dont know long to tell you the truth this had been going or how much longer it lasted. we got up this morning to a cloudy sky so you could not see this formation anymore. i tried to report this sighting last night. i could not. my computer refused to come as if it had no power even though i knew it did. i have an older computer that i finially got to come on but the statlite dish internet was down, my phone did not work and the police scanner was all messed up. it was though the ufos were jamming every thing so i could not report this sighting and they were determined to do it. it was later on this morning before my computer was finially back to normal, thankfully there was no permanent damage to anything. i was glad because i do not have the money to replace any of it. it looked like there was a trail of gas between the objects but it might have been my imagination.
content.summary: Speres and chevron

content.detailedDescription: Blue and red lights that pulse. not smacks from an aircraft. appered to eject small white objects from center. position was stationary for an hour on 3-6-2012 and 3-7-2012. i am a former marine in the airwing this was not an aircraft that i've ever seen. it made no noise and remained stationary.
content.summary: 2 nights in a row this thing just sits in the same place for over an hour

content.detailedDescription: Taking pictures of the shuttle landing at ksc as the shuttle came in from the south about to land.  the shuttle is just seconds from landing and about to drop the landing gear. picture taken from launch complex 39 looking west as the shuttle glided in.  one of the pictures had an object that appears to be above and just west of the shuttle.  the object was not seen while viewing the shuttle, only when examining the picture. the object only appeared in one of the photo's taken.  we did not see any chase aircraft.
content.summary: Ufo in picture when shuttle landing

content.detailedDescription: This is ongoing as i write this report, last couple of weeks loud distant roaring like thunder that repeats over and over, it sounds like a huge jet engine going in a circle?  get lower then louder over and over, its dooing it right now, and last 2 weeks????? call me you can hear it on the phone
content.summary: Unknown sound

content.detailedDescription:
1. standing on back porch smoking cigarette
2. bright light
3. bright object slowely asended and got brighter. the brightness was bluring looking at it. after asended it remained stationary and airplane looked to have pasted behid it and the plane was much smaller and had the distinct flashing lights. did not notice any sound of a helicopter or anything else. the light looked to be a yellowish tint. it looks like the light ascended into no where. i video taped some with my i-phone and after reviewing the video the object appears white and solid and much smaller.
5.My feelings were it is a ufo. my wife started panicing thinking it was a comet or astroid falling to the surface.
6. lost sight by the object dissapearing.
content.summary: Bright light coming closer airplane that passed was much smaller suddenly dissapered

content.detailedDescription: I was just taking some long exposure photos of the night sky from my room when 13 strange lights looking somewhat like orbs and aligned in a strange pattern appeared on one of my photos just over the forest. whatever it was i did not see with my own eyes and did appear only in one of the several photos i took that evening. the exposure time was set at 30 seconds.
content.summary: Lights on the evening sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my car making a turn when i noticed two very large objects in sky. it was about 1pm. not in the shape of any known object like a plane or a bird. one was larger than the other and they were moving in a somewhat straight line and in unison. they seemed to change shape slightly as they moved but were still oddly square. did not look like any bird or plane i have ever seen. i lost sight of them when i made my turn, i was on my way to work. other wise i would have followed them. very strange, have never looked at anything in the sky before and not had an explanation.
content.summary: Saw two square like objects moving in unison over south shore blvd.

content.detailedDescription:
In late august of 1949 i and another boy (we are both alive, cognitive and active) were abducted and taken aboard a disc like craft where i (i cannot say the same happened to the other man) was examined and an unknown type of medical procedure was performed on both my mind and body. the abduction took place in a rural area approximately 8-miles south of the town of rainier oregon at 10 pm in the evening while the two of us were walking along a country road that led towards mayger oregon.

however, our being taken was not remembered other than as a fragmented event until 1987 when the two of us again met up at a wake being held for my mother. upon seeing me across the room the other man simply stated, "do you remember when we lit up"? that is when we were first able to talk about our being taken with others. more of the event was learned in 2007 when i was hypnotically regressed by a therapist for ptsd and the event was what came to mind and not any event during the vietnam war.

since then the other man has told me that when our bodies lit up with a white light that covered us from head to tow but not other nearby objects he said that he was able to see my entire skeleton and it scared the hell out of him. 

after we were released i did see a large fan type structure that glowed with a blue light which was similar in intensity and hue to the shaft of light that was used to bring the two of us up into the ship.
content.summary: Large disc with a round though somewhat oval opening in bottom that was hazy or foggy

content.detailedDescription: Three star like objects in a triangle formation. watched objects for 5 minutes then the top right object  shot up and out of sight. then i watched the other two for a while then i went inside. it was unusually bright it was definatly not a star.
content.summary: Three star like objects in a triangle formation. watched objects for 5 minutes then the top right object  shot up and out of sight

content.detailedDescription: Saw about 5 lights at various locations over edmonton. left my 16 mp camera at home. ran into office and got my 2 mp camera and snapped a few pictures. no nite vision on the camera. the one in the picture attached was moving and then hovered. i was careful not to jiggle the camera. the vertical white streak to the left of the ufo is a reflection off the back south wall of our shop next door.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw lights moving in the sky over edmonton

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside of good samaritan hospital on maxwell street, having a cigarette break with a nurse and a nurse tech.  i was facing downtown they were facing the hospital.  i was looking at my iphone to find a link of a baby picture to show them when my cell phone went a bit crazy.. kind of like noise you see on a tv channel that isn't working!  that was weird.  one of my friends said " wow what is going on with your iphone!" i looked up at him  and i saw a fireball object hovering for a split second, then it moved to the left then up and to the right and then it fell in a trajectory fashion like a falling star... 
i quickly said "did you guys see that" as it disappeared behind the building.  by the time they looked the big fireball looking thing disappeared to what seemed to be a trajectory decent to the north of lexington.
content.summary: Ufo fireball that changed direction

content.detailedDescription: As i was sitting in my car after pumping gas at shell station less than a mile from my home, i noticed a bright white fixed light hovering just below the ridge-line. it was low enough that at 1st glance, i thought maybe it was just a light from a home or building on the ridge. i then noticed the light wasn't fixed to part of any structure, & that it was moving very slowly towards my location; i sat in my car  at the gas pump to watch the light as it sort of drifted slowly, & effortlessly closer to my position. it moved closer & closer very lazily, to reveal 2 flashing lights (slightly varying in color, sort of off-white & amber; [note] they were not apparent upon initially seeing the aircraft) on it's right side. i couldn't make out a shape at that time, & i assumed that it was just a helicopter, as the altitude seemed too low for an airplane. i rolled down my windows (from cracked to fully open) to see if i could hear any engine noise, there was absolutely no sound; the gas station wasn't busy, so there was no obstruction in my ability to hear it if there were. as i said before, the craft was at very low altitude. as the craft flew (almost) directly over head, it's shape & characteristics became obvious; it was distinctively triangular, & the wing span was at-least double the size of any airplane i've ever seen. there was a singular bright fixed lights on it's nose, a bright amber light in the dead center, 2 flashing lights at the tip of each wing (or where the wings should've been). the craft drifted listlessly, moving as if it were underwater, & as i was observing, it sort of banked slightly to reveal it's underside, & effortlessly flew turned vertically w/a wing pointed towards the sky, & a wing pointed to the ground. it maintained this maneuver for only a short period of time, however it was able to perform it w/an ease that seemed highly unusual. each of these lights that formed this triangular shape were very vivid & not characteristic of any standard aircraft i'm familiar w/. i felt the urge to get out of the car & alert it to the attention the few people around outside, however no1 was paying any attention, nor did the seem like they'd be interested, & my shyness/fear of embarrassment wouldn't allow me to speak up to point it out. i noticed it was flying towards an area i was familiar w/, so i decided to follow it. i lost sight of it as i was making a u-turn in the parking lot to head in it's direction, & as tried to relocate the object, it had completely disappeared. i don't know if i just lost track of it, or what, but the direction it was moving, along w/the apparent speed & size, plus the fact it only took 20 seconds or so to turn around & pull out of the parking lot, i felt like i should've been able to relocate it w/ease, but it was nowhere to be found. it was disappointing to lose track, however it was exhilarating to be eyewitness to such a marvel of aeronautics, whether it be 1 of ours, or from another world all-together. the area my small town occupies seems to be a magnet for ufo activity, as i see strange lights/craft fairly often...
content.summary: Large completely silent triangular aircraft gliding slowly at low altitude a few miles from my location

content.detailedDescription: Driving to fresno on tuesday, march 6, 2012 at approximately 10:40 pm, several of us saw pulsating red lights hovering near the intersection of dickenson and jensen avenue. we drove toward it on our way home but the sporadic display of aerial lights floated away in a northeast direction. once we got to the city, we lost sight of the craft but saw it reappear hovering just northeast of fresno, hovering over the ridge of the sierra nevada mountain range. it didn't make a sound and continued to pulsate erratically. we used our digital camera but the sky was too dark and the craft was too distant. at least ten individuals simultaneously witnessed this phenomenon. the craft was about the size of two football fields when fully lit but could morph into a third of its size at will. we watched in shock and amazement. we braved the cold until 1am, watching it hover  and change its  light pattern.
content.summary: Hovering craft with bright lights over fresno 3/6/2012

content.detailedDescription: my friend and i were comeing back from paradice and we were passing the resevior and we both noticed a bright light and looked up north of magalia, there was a fastly decending object into the north mountains of magalia. it was split into three objects that had two smaller peaces in the front and one larger object behind it. i of course thought a meteorite, but it looked bigger then or the same as a 747 if put together, and i am shure i would have noticed the impact in some way or another, and also it had a slightly green aura that kinda creeped me out. i would love some follow up to this, i am kind of a sceptic, but i will be looking for it to hit the news. it was def not identified by my friend or i.
content.summary: My friend and i both saw an object in flames crashing into the mountins north of magalia, it did not look like any meteor i have ever seen. the flames were green!!!

content.detailedDescription: Took 12 pics at nite saw what looked to be a star very brite but it was to low.I asked my girlfriend what she thought it could be she did not no so i asked her to pull over i always carry my camera with me so she pulled over  and i took the pictures we talked about it all the way home when i got home i put the chip in my computor and i have microsoft picture it premium 9 so i tried to focus in on each photo and one photo 2689 i zoomed in on and if you look closely you could see a alien or what ever it is sitting in a chair with its arm up in the air the ufo looked to be green red and white its been in big bear now for 5 days at nite when you see it at nite it is very bright.Would like to no if what i saw is real darren
content.summary: Going up mountain took 12 pics 1 showed alien in ship

content.detailedDescription: Took 12 pics at nite saw what looked to be a star very brite but it was to low.I asked my girlfriend what she thought it could be she did not no so i asked her to pull over i always carry my camera with me so she pulled over  and i took the pictures we talked about it all the way home when i got home i put the chip in my computor and i have microsoft picture it premium 9 so i tried to focus in on each photo and one photo 2689 i zoomed in on and if you look closely you could see a alien or what ever it is sitting in a chair with its arm up in the air the ufo looked to be green red and white its been in big bear now for 5 days at nite when you see it at nite it is very bright.Would like to no if what i saw is real darren
content.summary: Going up mountain took 12 pics 1 showed alien in ship

content.detailedDescription: I was in my back yard with my dog waiting for him to go to the bathroom. i looked up to look at the stars. at first glance i thought it was an airplane flying extremely high. it was approaching a star so i could see that it was moving, then i noticed the flashing lights that i thought were wing lights on a plane. the object then slowed to a stop, stayed there for a few seconds then continued north for a few seconds, then it changed direction as if it had bounced off of something, moved south east for a couple of seconds slowly changed direction again back towards north west. it continued starting and stopping making slight changes of direction while slowly making its way north. at one point it was almost directly overhead. during this time a few planes passed trough the same airspace, it was more than obvious this was not a plane. the types of flashes on the planes were completely different and the planes had what looked like green and red lights and white lights that also did not flash. this object had one orange light on one "corner" on the other two "corners" it had flashing strobe type lights that seemed to fire off in 3 bursts at a time per light. from the bottom it appeared to be a triangular shaped object, but since it was dark out and the object was dark with no ambient light seeming to hit it or reflect off of it, it was difficult to be sure of the shape. it appeared to pass through a cloud, which was the first time i had any perception of how far it was, as it passed through the cloud, it changed direction to almost completely westward and picked up speed pertty rapidly, then just as suddenly slowed back down. i lost sight of it as it headed west and went behing a tree line. i tried to record it on my phone but i don't think anything came out, it was too small and or far away.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: At first glance i thought it was an airplane flying extremely high.

content.detailedDescription:
It was a beautiful clear day here in laguna beach ca...The orbs i have seen before but only one at a time...This was the first time right in front of my house that i saw between 6-8 orbs...One was an orange color, one was pinkish...Color the others were just like bright balls....Then towards the north there is a hill and i can see planes taking off...There was a ship of some kind did not get a picture but i got a blurry one of the large ball of light it flashed before it disappeared....Then towards the south a object came up wards and then began to fly south east  it was black with light going around flashing as it was flying...This was the most i have ever seen in my life...It was cool...I had a feeling that morning that i was going to have some sightings i just didn't think it was going to be this much...Over in the north every time a plane took off for about an hour an orb a darker one in color would shoot up as the plane was taking off...I am excited...I asked the first orb if it was alone or did it have friends 10 minutes later i saw all the 6-8 orbs hang out and flash and then slowly move upwards and then just gone....

my camera is not very good gotta get a new one but here they are...
content.summary: Orbs were first. one then there were 8  all together ship gave off huge bright ball of light  the other ship had lights glowing as it flew over my neigborhood  a darker orb kept popping up every time a plane took off from john wayne airport

content.detailedDescription:
On saturday march 2nd at aproximately 7:20pm i was returning home and saw moving glowing lights in the sky. there was a low cloudcover. the weather was unsettled. it was very dark and i first saw the light in my peripheral vision while driving behind my vehicles high beams out my drivers side window. the 4 lights appeared to be just at cloud level. i first thought they might be ground reflections from a ems or police vehicle, because of the weather and the rotation. their rotation was parallel to the ground though the unit moved to the ne

this was in a very rural area. there were 4 lights and they appeared glowing at the base of the clouds near airline goldmine rd and us 29 in hart county, ga. they were organized in the cardinal points of the compass or at 12,3 6 and 9 o'clock on a watch face from my perspective. they rotated ccw 180 degres and paused, moved to the centerpoint and merged. there was a slight pause as they merged as one, though there was no increase in intensity of the 4 merged lights. they instantly separated into 4 individual lights again and moved back to the exact positions. each cycle was aproximately 5 seconds. there was no deviation of this cycle or the intensity of the lights. it was steady and exact. their cyclic pattern was intentional, mathematical, purposeful. or at least that is what i read into my own observations.

they moved gradually to the ne, but would remain stationary at times. as i moved, attempting to get better views, it was almost as if the lights remained a constant distance from me. i followed them and they remained in view nearly continually for a period of over 20 minutes.  holding my arm out, the 4 lights perimeter of rotation was about as large as a dinner plate. 

there was no noise or sudden movement (short of the steady cycle) the entire time i observed them. they seemed to stay over woods, pasture and farmland as i attempted to figure out what they were.

my actions were intional and based on curiousity. after 20 minutes of watching with no change whatsoever and the fact i was not able to change my perspective or effect any change i simply went home.
content.summary: 4 rotatating(ccw), merging lights.

content.detailedDescription: While flying to richmond virgina from charlotte north carolina with my father we witnessed a ufo fly by our personally owned plane. the object was a ball of light which slowed to match our aircraft's speed and direction. when this happened all the electrical equipment in the vehicle turned off. after matching our course and speed for about 10 - 15 seconds the ufo accelerated rapidly until is disappeared from view moving slightly away from our aircraft's course by a few degree's. as soon as the ufo flew away from us everything electrical in our aircraft immediatly turned on again and operated as normal.
content.summary: Witnessed close up ufo while flying with father from charlotte to richmond virginia.

content.detailedDescription: 1950hrs on march 5, 2012, while driving in my automobile on the crest of a hill, i noticed a rectangular green object moving horizontally within the southwest hemisphere over amsterdam, new york. the object appeared to be a rectangular shaped object similar to that of a street sign or green glow stick. i initially thought three things; reflection on my windshield, reflection of a street light, or a helicopter or airplane/jet. as i watched the object race across the sky it immediately dived vertically towards the ground at an immense rate of descent. i thought that this might unfortunately be an aircraft in distress, but upon further driving, there was no sign or fire or downed power lines in it's path of motion. it was a steady green streak of light, similar to that of a green colored skittle bag. the object simply disappeared as if someone had turn a switch off. after serving in the air force for almost 22 years, i have found this sighting the most frightening and unexplainable that i have ever encountered. ironically, 4 other people had seen the same object at the same time (including a 3 year old boy and his mother), and as i questioned them, they on their own will told of the same time of occurrence in the same vicinity.
content.summary: Large green rectangular object hovering then rapid descent

content.detailedDescription: Iwas in my home and looked out the window and saw flashing lights, first i thought it was a star so i got my binuculars and checked and you could see the red white and blueish color lights. i had gotten up to go down and check my computer because i could not sleep. when i came back up from downstairs i looked out my south facing window and saw what appeared to be a flashing light. this was the second time i had noticed similar lights at just after midnight. they both took place on sunday nights or early monday morning. first i thought it was a helicopter looking for a lost snowmobiler but after checking with search and recue the next day they didn't know about any lost or injured snowmobiler. it was hard to say what the size or shape was as it was at least five miles away from me. we over look snowbank mountain and we have a good view from our windows. the object eventually dropped down behind the mountain ridge and i never saw it again.
content.summary: Approxiamate distance 5 miles

content.detailedDescription: Traveling fast like a car passing by on the main road..That speed
content.summary: A rectangualr like craft that flew as if it were moving sideways if that makes sense with flashing lights

content.detailedDescription: I was having a new years party walk out side and observed the stars and saw a strange blue object fly over my house at frist i thought it was a plane but it didn't flash it stopped hovered for about one minute and than flew away at about 1000 mph.
content.summary: The object flew past my home hover for one minute and shot away at about 1000 mph

content.detailedDescription: Just came on duty, security for wise alloys. still dark. work gate by myself. plant is out in the country. eating some mcdonalds standing outside guard shack and noticed off in the distance over a stretch of pasture what looked at first to be a helicopter slowly traversing field. about a mile away or less. watched it for a min or two as it came closer to plant. realized that i did not hear any rotor noise. looked closer as it came toward new conctruction( new smelter building) it dissapeared behind building for a min then came right over the top and it was then i realized that i had no idea what it was. took out my cell phone and tried to get camara on, my hands where shaking pretty bad. got it on looked up and it was almost directly over me at i would guess about fifty feet. i took a couple of shots as it began to asscend. it got up pretty high im not sure maybe a thousand feet and then it just vanished. after the fact i remembered that it did not make noise but it did vibrate my chest and head. very strange feeling and hard to explain. it had three distinct lights on the underside that changed in intensity as it took off... very blue and slightly violet. no heat. the top side was very dark and i could not see any detail. not a saucer sape but a circle cut in half. flat side down. no lights on top. my air force buddy tried to tell me its one of ours but he is wrong. i am familiar with most aircraft and this was not one of ours.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Half orb, three brilliant blue lights on bottom, came accross field seemed to search then stopped over me. began to accend and then poof, gone. scared the hell out of me.

content.detailedDescription: Approx 10:35 pm on sat. march 3rd, 2012 i was driving down cam. vera cruz in san clemente.  something caught my attention in the sky, northeast of where i was.  3 glowing, orange & red fireball type objects were in the sky, hovering over the hillside.  one object was larger than the other 2 and appeared to be approx the size of a basketball, though i don't know how far away it actually was from me.  the other 2 were smaller, appearing to be the size of softballs, maybe larger.  i stopped in the middle of the street to take pictures and watch them more carefully to make sure they weren't planes or helicopters (though they appeared to be way too low to be aircraft).  one of the smaller ones then faded & dissapeared.  i continued driving, while watching them.  my view was blocked temporarily by some trees and when my view was clear again, only the larger object remained.  i had driven to pick up my son from a friends house and when he came out, he saw it too, though it appeared to have moved higher in the sky.  this all occured over approx a 10 minute period.  as we drove out of the neighborhood, the trees once again blocked our view and when our view was once again clear, the object was gone. i was fascinated and curious about what they were, but wasn't scared.  the photos i took with my cell phone aren't great quality, but when you zoom in you can see glowing yellow-orange balls of light.
content.summary: Witnessed 3 glowing balls of light, one larger than the other two.  appeared to be hovering over neighborhood.

content.detailedDescription: I live in yardley, pa. i live under a flight path and have been a smoker for years. i'm used to going outside at night smoking and looking at the planes flying over head. last night i was facing in a west, south west direction and an unusually bright light for a star caught my attention. i don't know what made me keep watching, but at first it was hovering not moving, you would have mistaken it for a star, almost like it was trying to act like a star. then it started moving up and down, left and right, diagonally. i'm used to seeing planes at night, and that behaved like no plane i've ever seen. my estimation was it flew around 5-10,000 ft.  it appeared like it was hovering just out of the way of the flight path and to me it seemed to e observing the planes flying. it was cold, slightly windy that night but clear it was still dark but when i saw these crazy movements it was almost like watching a bouncy ball in the air the way it moved, it appeared to be trailing or releasing smoke, but silhouetted against a clear black sky, i could only make the smoke out when the objects light pulsated brighter. i feel i saw that smoke, but that is the one part of what i saw that i'm not 100% on.  also twice i watched planes come in near my house and this object. the planes had only strobes on, then when it looked like they got danger close to the object, they turned their bright lights on, crash lights what ever they are called. if you dig a little in flight records from philly international, or trenton mercer airport, you may find something out. those airplanes would have seen it better then me on the ground. i'm not an expert, or a crazy person. what made me write this was i've never seen anything in the sky move like that in my life. i dont want to say i saw a ufo, but if it wasnt, i've never seen any plane or helicopter move that way at night.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Orb like. pulsating color. would dim as well.

content.detailedDescription: Here are additional moon pictures ,no flash, normal, usining tints, and reverse contrast. via my droid 2 i phone. most of pictures contain object in all catagories. g.A. from whittier.
content.summary: Caught object circling moon have more pictures to add
